title.rendered: Recruiting for the New Age: Insights and Tips for SMEs by Rosey Nathan

content.rendered:
Rosey has over 20 years of successful sales and management expertise.  Never one to be singularly focused, she has also expanded her knowledge at different organisations, and with a variety of side hustles, into podcasting, mentoring, consultancy, marketing, implementation, organisational and process review. 

Partner & Senior Sourcing Specialist @ Customise Talent Group, Chief Commercial Officer @ Her Career, Host of the “Rosey On Recruitment & Career” podcast, Co-Host of the “Her Career” podcast and a CMgr FIML that loves to share with imperfect, whole human, realness. 

Rosey is one busy, connected and caring woman who loves to share her experience, to support and accelerate others. In her chat with Jess Mason the Head of Marketing at iT360 Rosey had the following to share.
